description: T1. Horsechestnut Cavity at 7m: Crown reduce by 2m, remove dead branches. Remove basal and trunk shoots up to 5m. T2. Horsechestnut Remove basal and trunk shoots up to 5m. Carry out climbing inspection. T3. Horsechestnut Cavity at base of tree:Crown reduce by 2m, remove dead branches. (Current height 24m and spread 21m)Remove basal and trunk shoots up to 5m. T4. Holm Oak Suppressed with a 10% western lean:Reduce height by 2m and lateral spread by 3.5m.(Current height 19m and spread 16m) T11. Hornbeam Lift canopy to 5.5m over main access road.Reduce back branches to clear streetlight by 2m. T12. Sycamore Poor condition/cavity at 1m:Cut out grass to a 1m circumference around base of tree.Instal much to a depth of 15cm, to help improve vigour. T13. Sycamore Crown lift to 3m and remove dead branches. T14. Sycamore Large cavity a
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
